articles.title: Silent Hill: Ascension trailer teases Konami’s streaming horror series - Polygon
articles.description: Konami and Genvid have released a new trailer for Silent Hill: Ascension, the massively multiplayer interactive streaming horror series coming to PC, console, and mobile.
articles.content: A new look at Konami and Genvids massively interactive horror streaming series
